devdoc.details: Need to expand the Portfolio interface (and abstract contract) and move it out in a seperate file. Verify Interface/Methods of abstract contract implemented for each Portfolio supported.
devdoc.title: Registry Contract for Portfolios of NFTs

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract to manage standardize Portfolios (Create/Locate portfolio contracts: Factory and Registry patterns) compliant with Verifiable credentials: Certificate of Authenticity, Certificate of Ownership, etc. )
